original_text: After that, Jesus appeared to the 11 apostles while they were eating. He told them that they were wrong not to believe. They should have been ready to believe. People had seen that he was now alive again. But the disciples had not believed them.
korean_text: 그 후에 열한 제자가 음식 먹을 때에 예수께서 그들에게 나타나사 그들의 믿음 없는 것과 마음이 완악한 것을 꾸짖으시니 이는 자기가 살아난 것을 본 자들의 말을 믿지 아니함일러라

sentences.original_text: After that, Jesus appeared to the 11 apostles
that they were wrong not to believe
They should have been ready to believe
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 믿을 준비가 되어 있었어야 했다

sentences.original_text: that he was now alive again
But the disciples had not believed them
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 제자들은 그들의 말을 믿지 않았다
